title: African Heritage Digital Education Center Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A course for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to explore African diaspora history and culture through digital tools and project-based learning, enhancing technical skills in genetic research, digital archive analysis, etc.

learning_goals: Learners can interpret African lineage history data with 80% accuracy using digital platforms (virtual museum, genetic analysis tools)
Learners can produce digital cultural heritage content (e.g., interactive timelines, virtual exhibitions) of African descent through PBL team projects
Learners can analyze genetic research data and present pedigree linkage results at least three times using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
